headline: Could Ultra-High-Yield Altria Help You Retire a Millionaire?
summary: There are a lot of things to like about Altria (NYSE: MO), particularly if you are a dividend investor.  To give credit where credit is due, Altria owns the most important brand in its category in North America.  Altria's market share in cigarettes was a huge 45.7% in the third quarter of 2024.

headline: Capture Altria's 7% Yield In A Highly Regulated Industry
summary: Altria faces a significant regulatory burden and declining industry volumes, posing challenges to its growth. See why I continue to rate MO stock a buy.

headline: Philip Morris: Market Dominance In Smoke-Free Products Driving A Compelling Growth Story
summary: Philip Morris International is the largest tobacco company in the world by both market cap and sales. See why I rate PM stock a buy now.
